channel.title: {508} RuneScape Demon Wars {508} {Demo} _-The Master of All Private Servers-_
channel.description:
Please reply if you like it or not or else i will remove! Full Version is Coming Up Near Christmass MAXX! [img]http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/5/5b/Runescape-Logo.png[/img]
Demon Wars
[size=36pt][font=andale mono]NOTE:[/font][/size] [size=36pt][font=andale mono]My pc has bin fixed.[/font][/size]
[size=24pt]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/size]
[size=18pt]Become A Mod Today!!![/size]
The MOD contest has begun, if you would like to become a MOD when this server's full version launches online and private, you can sent me a private Message (on mopar) but it cant be any username or password that has bin used on mopar or rs or any site or forum on the web {IT MUST BE NEW!}. and i will add you as a MOD,
i cant add every one on it so you need to mension in the mail why you would like to be a MOD on my server. [size=24pt]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/size]
My latest project.
Features: 1, clan wars (100%) 2, castle wars (90%) 3, god wars dungeon (85%) 4, 5 dimensions (100%) {all npc's add all dimensions} 5, bounty hunter (100% with random drops) 6, fist of guthix (Reaper's lair) {in the cave of FOG are fear reapers that drop 100 to 1000 fog tokens} 7, NEW SUMMONING MONSTERS 8, Duel Arena (90%) {there is a glitch wich makes the client crash} [im trying to fix it] ________________________________________________________________ | | | | | Hey just a friendly note: | | | | The Full version will be LD | | | | Therefore it will have new models | | | | | ______________________________________________________________
Skills:
Attack, Defence and strength= 100%
Ranged= 90%
Magic= 90% Magic vs player (ancients) = 90% Magic vs player (modern) = 90% (still adding spells) Magic vs Npc (modern, ancients and lunar) = 100& (just wield any staff) {each staff has his own spell effect}
Prayer= 100%
Construction= 100%
(still bulby based)
FireMaking= 0%
(i used firemaking to respawn objects)
[size=24pt]Crafting= 50%[/size]
You can craft your own Dark Bow!!!!!!
All other skills work perfectly= 100%
(still buly based)
NPC SPAWN
Varrock ( shops are 100%) full npc talk lumbridge (shops are 100%) full npc talk falador (shops are 100%) full npc talk camelot (shops are 100%) full npc talk adrougne (shops are 100%) full npc talk edgville (shops are 100%) full npc talk yannile (shops are being made atm) full npc talk wildy (no shops) yet full npc talk
This server is going to be about the story of the grim reaper
Pics:" {these pics are just basic stuff these pics are only 10% of what i have done, and i have just begun
[img]http://i901.photobucket.com/albums/ac215/skillspar/castlewars.jpg[/img] [img]http://i901.photobucket.com/albums/ac215/skillspar/Clanwars.jpg[/img] [img]http://i901.photobucket.com/albums/ac215/skillspar/demonsatcamelot.jpg[/img] [img]http://i901.photobucket.com/albums/ac215/skillspar/GodwarsDungeon.jpg[/img] [img]http://i901.photobucket.com/albums/ac215/skillspar/Home.jpg[/img] [img]http://i901.photobucket.com/albums/ac215/skillspar/Magiconnpc.jpg[/img] [img]http://i901.photobucket.com/albums/ac215/skillspar/NewBitmapImage.jpg[/img] [img]http://i901.photobucket.com/albums/ac215/skillspar/PetSummon.jpg[/img] [img]http://i901.photobucket.com/albums/ac215/skillspar/SkillcapeEmotesWork.jpg[/img] [img]http://i901.photobucket.com/albums/ac215/skillspar/stairswork.jpg[/img] [img]http://i901.photobucket.com/albums/ac215/skillspar/SummoningShop.jpg[/img] [img]http://i901.photobucket.com/albums/ac215/skillspar/logoutbook.jpg[/img] [img]http://i901.photobucket.com/albums/ac215/skillspar/Bandos.jpg[/img] [img]http://i901.photobucket.com/albums/ac215/skillspar/portaldoor.jpg[/img] [img]http://i901.photobucket.com/albums/ac215/skillspar/quests.jpg[/img] [img]http://i901.photobucket.com/albums/ac215/skillspar/ROCKS.jpg[/img] [img]http://i901.photobucket.com/albums/ac215/skillspar/SPECIALSHOP.jpg[/img] [img]http://i901.photobucket.com/albums/ac215/skillspar/StavesSHOP.jpg[/img] [img]http://i901.photobucket.com/albums/ac215/skillspar/TeleportGFX.jpg[/img]
[size=36pt]I HAVE MADE NEW CURSORS OUT OF THE 614 SPRITE DUMP I WILL MAKE THOSE DOWNLOADEBLE WHEN I RELEASE THE WHOLE THING![/size]
Release Date: unknown (depends on how much i still have to work.
(reply if u like or i remove)
Developer And Owner:demonWars
_-INFO-_
READ THIS!!!!
THIS SERVER IS MADE BY: DEMONWARS, THERE WILL BE FILES THAT ARE USED FROM; TOKKULSCAPE AND MITHSCAPE, SO THERE WILL BE SOMETHINGS THAT YOU THINK I HAVE SEEN THIS BEFORE, WELL... YOU HAVE, SOMETHINGS HAVE BIN USED FROM THOSE 2 SOURCES. THATS WHY I AM TELLING THE TRUTH SO NOBODY WILL CALL ME A LEECHER, CUZ I AM NOT.
i am very proud of my recent work, but for i have taken some of the files of other sources i only take 50% of the credit for this server so 25% to mithscape and 25% to tokkulscape
let me be clear for a second: things that i used from mithscape: The Sound Engine The Shop InterFace Engine The Possibility to show the player's head on the ChatBoxInterface And last but not least: the magic and combat engine
things i used from Tokkulscape: The Commands The Player.java contents the training/chill/admin/mod areas the NPCoption1/2/3.java (only talk and DSquest) and honestly, ALOT MORE
note: this version is only a demo, so i will be adding alot more note2: after i have made the full version, i will not be making newer versions but patches
[shadow=red,left]Download[/shadow] [shadow=red,left][url=http://uppit.com/nerj66056k5b/RSDW.rar]http://uppit.com/nerj66056k5b/RSDW.rar[/url][/shadow]
[size=36pt]MOST IMPORTANT!!!,[/size]
[shadow=red,left][size=18pt]THIS SERVER IS NOT LEECHED, AS I HAVE MADE CLEAR BEFORE I HAVE USED FILES FROM MITHSCAPE AND TOKKULSCAPE, I HAVE NOT LEECHED A SINGE SERVER[/size][/shadow]
[size=36pt][shadow=red,left]Read Readme files in server folders[/shadow][/size]
[size=18pt][font=verdana][shadow=red,left]Hey for those ppl that have tried it, i am working on all weapons: all weapons will have sounds and there will be more weapons useble[/shadow][/font][/size]
[size=36pt]FULL VESRION IS COMING UP!!![/size]
